input.sentences: i decided to make a trip to the city .
i love all the old buildings .
i saw an old bicyle on a house .
there was some great marble on window .
all the details make this a great place to take pictures .
output.sentences: Charlie, recently single, decided to go on a trip.
He didn't mind that it had just snowed—the scenery for looking at old buildings was perfect.
One of his favorites was an old pharmacy with a bike on the roof advertising free delivery.
He loved taking photos of historic buildings, which he planned to put on Instagram.
The craftsmanship was so much better back then.
